dcterms:creator: Ö. Uzuner
B. R. South
S. Shen

dcterms:description: The i2b2 2010 dataset is used for evaluating the performance of models in identifying and extracting concepts from biomedical texts, specifically focusing on named entities in clinical reports.
dcterms:title: i2b2 2010

dcterms:creator: A. E. W. Johnson
T. J. Pollard
L. Shen
L.-w. H. Lehman

dcterms:description: MIMIC-III is a freely accessible critical care database that contains clinical data for patients, which can be used for various biomedical NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:creator: J. Lee
W. Yoon
S. Kim
D. Kim
S. Kim
C. So
J. Kang
dcterms:description: PubMed is a database of biomedical literature that provides access to a vast amount of research articles, which can be utilized for training language models in biomedical text mining.
dcterms:title: PubMed

dcterms:creator: O. Bodenreider
dcterms:description: The Unified Medical Language System (UMLS) integrates biomedical terminology and provides a framework for understanding the relationships between different medical concepts.
dcterms:title: UMLS

dcterms:creator: R. A. Côté
S. Robboy
dcterms:description: SNOMED is a comprehensive clinical terminology that provides a standardized way to represent medical concepts and their relationships.
dcterms:title: SNOMED
